channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:16 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 11:16 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Myriv territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 11:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Myriv territorial community. Take cover! #Myriv_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
